page.title: 15HOUSING IN LYDBROOK
page.content: Types of housing-Lydbrook area. The spread of housing in Lydbrook is restricted by its geographical position in the steep sided narrow valley of the Lyd Brook.The B4234 runs along the valley floor.Most of the houses are found on the side of the valley which is intersected by two B roads forming two areas Hangerberry and Worrall Hill.Houses are found by these roadsides and adjoining lanes.There are also unfenced footpaths leading from the valley bottom.The houses are predominantly older cottage style buildings probably dating from the latter part of the last century. They are built from the local grey stone and roofed with slate.
